articles.title: Facebook Bans 7 'Cyber Mercenary' Companies for Spying on 50,000 Users - The Hacker News
articles.description: Facebook has banned hundreds of accounts associated with 7 'Cyber Mercenary' companies that spied on nearly 50,000 Facebook and Instagram users.
